Motivational Wall Art – This canvas picture wall art designed with inspirational themed (printed letters Success), keep you positive every day, make people dare to pursue their dreams.

Ready To Hang Inspirational Wall Art – Each bedroom wall art has a metal hook already mounted on the wooden bar, ready to hung on the wall or stand on the table.

Quadruple Storage Space: The shelf lamp has 5 tiers, and each board allows to put 50 pound max. You can put photo frame, plants, books, or any items on it (ATTENTION: To avoid the lamp fall down, please use the “Torque” to keep steady).

15mins Easy Installation: We provide detailed manual and intallation video. This lamp is easy to install, normally can be finished by one person. The whole lamp decors your living room, bedroom, office or any home corner, its simple and sector design suit for all furnishing style.
addlon’s 3 Year Product Support: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and we offer 3 year quality support. Please contact us FIRST in anytime if you have any problem. We are glad to provide help.

Arced Design

Pull-chain Switch

Specifications:
Color Map: Black and white, green
Material: 400 GSM Card Stock Paper
Size: 8 x 10 inch/ 20 x 25 cm
Style: Watercolor
 
Package Includes:
4 x Inspirational Wall Art Prints
1 x Gift Packaging
 
Notes:
Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.
The colors may have slight differences due to different digital screens.
 
INSPIRATIONAL WALL ART: Our unframed motivational quotes wall decor is originally designed to create a joyful and positive atmosphere in Office, Bedroom, Living Room, Gym, Class. Botanical plant design makes this black and white art more elegant and beautiful; you will be completely in love with the way they look, starting your day in a good mood when you are looking at this simple inspirational wall art.
QUALITY PRINT: Laser printing process, these motivational wall art sets are clearly displayed on bright white card stock paper, feature clean design and high resolution; botanical watercolor designs printed on 400 GSM sturdy, white stiff card stock with a high gloss UV coating. They are vibrant, durable, and dust resistant for long-term use.
UNFRAMED: Please note that our art sets come UNFRAMED. You get a set of four 8″x 10″ Prints, so you can choose the perfect frames to match your own style and the room decoration. Our inspiration art will fit well in your standard 8″ x 10″ frames without mat or larger frames with 8″ x 10″ mat. Framed or hung with clips are also great ways to show off your beautiful prints.
EASY & THOUGHTFUL GIFT: Our positive affirmations wall art prints are packaged with beautiful and high-quality Gift Packaging to make them ready to give and to protect your arts from any possible damage in transit. They are perfect gifts for you loved one. Please enjoy these little things!
ORIGINAL DESIGN: We are here to provide you with original and creative designs to light up your room, remind you of the beautiful sparkles in life with these pretty prints. It will be the perfect addition to your office, bedroom, class.

LARGE DISPLAY — 6.6 inches large LED screen with large numbers make it very easy to read the time. You can also use our led clock as a mirror, its operation is very simple.
DUAL USB PORT — 2 USB charging ports can simultaneously charge two devices. SBackup battery (included) only stores time and alarms’ settings. Tips: This clock can only be used when powered by USB powered.
SNOOZE FUNCTION — Big snooze button helps you to easily turn off the buzzer without opening eyes, and get extra 5-60 minutes sleep. Is your essential artifact.
ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS — The mirror digital clock provides 3-level brightness,adjust by manual or auto to a comfortable brightness. Very convenient to use.
NIGHT MODE — The quiet and silent clock allows you to get rid of the hustle and bustle of the night and fall asleep peacefully. At night the mirror alarm clock will automatically enter the lowest brightness state to prevent affecting your sleep quality.

Product Description

EACHPAI Floating Corner Shelves Wall Mount Set of 4

Enhance any dull corners in your home with our set of 4 rustic floating shelves. Mount the decorative shelves in your living room and display some potted plants, books or collectibles on it. Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!

For Bathroom

For Kitchen

For Bedroom

Solid Wood

Made of high-quality paulownia wood, lightweight yet solid with clear texture and the unique handcraft creates a retro style.

Stable Triangular Bracket

The brackets are made of high-quality steel, the triangular design and the elegant matte black finish ensure the shelves stable and fit anywhere in your room.

What’s Included:

4 × wooden boards 8 × triangular metal brackets 20 × big screws 20 × dry wall anchors 20 × small screws 1 × instruction manual

Creative Corner Shelves: Perfect combination of floating and corner shelves.You can make full use of the blank corners and turnings in your room to increase more storage space and make your room neat and organized.
Multifunctional Storage Shelves: Comes with 4 pieces shelves, dimension: 16*11.4inch. Perfect for displaying and holding collectibles, small plants, photo frames, books, etc. Can be used in bedroom, living room, bathroom, kitchen, office and more.
Easy to Install: All the needed tools and detailed intallation guide are in the package, just follow the simple instruction to install the hanging shelves in a few minutes. Any questions or problems, just contact us via Amazon and we always get your back.
Sturdy Wood Shelves: Made of high quality paulownia wood, these shelves are lightweight yet sturdy enough to hold your favorite items. They won’t add too much burden to the wall but per shelf has a max load-bearing capacity of 40lbs.
Rustic Wall Shelves: Torched wood finish and curve design for board and matte finish metal bracket features a carbonized black accent, which will be a great rustic addition to your wall.

Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!
